definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: We eagerly await the sound of the engines.
sentences.chinese: 我們熱切期待着飛機引擎聲的出現。

sentences.english: The boy gazed at his uncle from those big, hot, blue eyes, set rather close together.
sentences.chinese: 男孩一雙熱切的，緊蹙的藍色大眼睛凝視着叔叔。

sentences.english: If given the opportunity I would very much like to host another international world classroom student.
sentences.chinese: 我們全家都熱切的期待接待下一梯次的國際教室學生。

sentences.english: They fervently hoped so, at any rate.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，他們熱切地希望這樣。

sentences.english: His wishful face haunts my dreams like the rain at night.
sentences.chinese: 他的熱切的臉，如夜雨似的，攪擾着我的夢魂。

sentences.english: I responsed passionately, but there wasn't your tender voice.
sentences.chinese: 我熱切地迴應着，卻不見你溫柔的聲音。

sentences.english: There is an eager look on his face.
sentences.chinese: 他臉上現出熱切的神色。

sentences.english: What is this almost eager anticipation of death?
sentences.chinese: 這種對死亡的熱切期盼到底是什麼呢？

sentences.english: Her wishful face haunts my dreams like the rain at night.
sentences.chinese: 她熱切的面孔如雨夜襲我的夢。

sentences.english: They have not contented themselves with wistful pleas formore democracy or civil rights.
sentences.chinese: 他們並不滿足於熱切的懇求更多的民族或者公民權利。

sentences.english: Him wishful face haunts my dreams like the rain at night.
sentences.chinese: 他的熱切的臉，如夜雨似的，攪擾着我的夢魂。

sentences.english: Yet Chinese households are hardly the most eager shoppers.
sentences.chinese: 然而中國家庭很難說得上是最熱切的購物者。

sentences.english: We are eager to see the fishing industry back on its feet and the region rebound.
sentences.chinese: 我們熱切期望魚類產業重回軌道，恢復地區經濟活力。

sentences.english: We are anxious that he shall be given a chace to try it out.
sentences.chinese: 我們熱切希望能給他機會試一試。

sentences.english: Her wishful face haunts my dreams like the rain at night .
sentences.chinese: 熱切的臉，如夜雨似的，攪擾着我的夢魂。

sentences.english: Sometimes we get so caught up in this world that we don't look forward with eagerness to the Lord's second coming.
sentences.chinese: 有時，我們被今世纒累，因而沒有熱切期盼主的再來。

definition: to be deeply concerned/to be troubled (by)
to be eager to give sth a try (idiom)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
